text.p: French energy group Total SA could increase its 1996 dividend, and a level of 10 francs per share, from 8.70 francs in 1995, is possible, chairman Thierry Desmarest told the Journal des Finances.
Asked whether the dividend would be raised to 10 francs per share, he said: "It is certainly a possibility but it is far too soon to announce a precise figure today."
He added there was a debate in the company whether it would continue giving a share alternative for the dividend payment.
